name: Quantum Shift (Centennial Game Development Program, Zantty, JustMey, Jacobsters, Rev)
name_original: Quantum Shift (Centennial Game Development Program, Zantty, JustMey, Jacobsters, Rev)
description:
The Abyssians have taken over. 

A ruined ship. A lone survivor. And a mission to make it back home. Do you have what it takes to escape?

 Quantum Shift is a top-down puzzle shooter in which you must escape from a ravaged ship, taken over by a mysterious lifeform. 

Utilizing the P-180 Teleportation Firearm, you will solve puzzles, teleport through dangerous spaces, fight back against the Abyssians, and make your way home.

 Quantum Shift is a first-year student project by a 5-person team. While it was a learning experience for everyone, we are quite happy with the outcome. 

We hope you enjoy the game! Good luck, spacefarer!

Anthony: https://rev03.itch.io/ 

Ronan: https://justmey.itch.io/
